item.title: Creating a Web Service Using Apache Axis2
item.description: Prerequisites We need Apache Axis2 running and a suitable container. You could also run Axis2 as a standalone server but for this let’s use Tomcat as a container. So in the following order Download and install Oracle JDK7 Download and install Tomcat 7 (even 8 would do, but it seems as of now Tomcat 8 isn’t being supported by Eclipse, so let’s go with version 7) Download and install Axis2 on Tomcat Oracle JDK7 Download and extract the JDK tarball.
